highlights: Developed Chef cookbooks to automate the installation and configuration of collectd, Nginx, Elasticsearch, and MySQL clusters
Built automation using the AWS Ruby SDK to delete unitilized EC2 instances, EBS volumes, and ELBs

Using Chef and the AWS Ruby SDK, lead the development of a CLI tool to automate the provisioning, maintenance, reporting, and decomissioning of entire AWS enviornments conisting of over 1500 EC2 instances
Developed automation using the AWS Ruby SDK to enforce multi-factor authentication and API key rotation for AWS accounts
Developed automation using the AWS Ruby SDK to track and alert on AWS service usage limits
Built real-time dashboards using Graphite, Grafana, Dashing, and Rundeck to visualize metrics from Jenkins CI pipelines, AWS, and Chef

work.summary: Collaborated with a multidisciplinary research team developing Santos, a high fidelity digital human modeling tool

Built GUIs for interacting with and visualizing data within Santos
Assisted in teaching a graduate course in predictive human modeling

work.summary: Conducted field verification and contributed to an engineering team to assist in the process of electrical systems commissioning
highlights: Documented occupancy sensors, lighting fixtures, and electrical ballasts of 11 campus buildings in Iowa City
Maintained communication with maintenance staff, management, and other project team members
